summary: No idea what it is, download at your own risk.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img442/2259/tsdt.jpg[/img]

[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Ter[/color][color=fuchsia]m[/color][color=silver]s:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]You may freely re-upload this mod, but you must leave all the files within the archive intact. 
You may freely modify my files for your personal use, but you MUST obtain my permission before releasing your work to the public. I would like to ensure that all derivative works maintain a certain level of quality standard.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=fuchsia]I[/color][color=silver]ntroduction: [/color][/size][/font]

[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]No idea what this mod is, or what it does. Download at your own risk. I will not be responsible for accidental death and/or dismemberment as the result of using this mod.

NOTE: May not be compatible with Hearthfire.
[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Require[/color][color=fuchsia]m[/color][color=silver]ents[/color]: [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Skyrim 1.9.32 Update (though, I suspect 1.8.151 will still work).[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Installat[/color][color=fuchsia]i[/color][color=silver]on:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=transparent]11[/color][FONT=impact][size=5][color=silver]NMM:[/color][/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Download, activate the mod, enjoy.[/size][/font][/color]

[color=transparent]11[/color][color=silver][FONT=impact][size=5]Manual:[/size][/font][/color]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Download, unpack, place \"Ambrosia.esp\" and \"Ambrosia.bsa\" inside your \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder, activate \"Ambrosia.esp\" in launcher, enjoy.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Lo[/color][color=fuchsia]c[/color][color=silver]ation:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]No idea. I do however hear rumors of something big happening inside Breezehome.[/size][/font][/color]



[font=impact][size=6][color=silver]Uninstallation[/color][color=fuchsia]:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=4]Remove[/font][/size]

[font=garamond][size=4]Ambrosia.esp
Ambrosia.bsa[/size][/font]

[size=4][FONT=helvetica]From your \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder.[/font][/size][/color]



=======

[font=impact][size=4][color=silver]Credits:[/color] [/size][/font]
[color=papayawhip][FONT=helvetica][size=3]Autodesk
Adobe
Bethesda[/size][/font][/color]
author: Elewin
